title: How to Turn Your Furby Evil

steps.title: Set your Furby down in front of you.
steps.content: Set your Furby down in front of you. If you have not activated or woken your mix up, do so now. Note that this method only works on your mixel. If you have a Furby Boom (2013), click here . If you try this method on a Furby Boom, you will get a Jolly Furby instead. The Furby's Evil personality is also called "ranting."

steps.title: Place your finger in your Furby's mouth, and press down on the tongue gently.
steps.content: Place your finger in your Furby's mouth, and press down on the tongue gently. Overfeeding your Furby is the fastest way to turn it evil.

steps.title: Wriggle your finger in the Furby's mouth for 1 minute.
steps.content: Wriggle your finger in the Furby's mouth for 1 minute. This will make the Furby think you are feeding it nonstop. Your Furby may start to cry or complain. Don't stop. Remember, overfeeding your Furby is what turns it evil.

steps.title: Wait for your Furby to go crazy before taking your finger out of its mouth.
steps.content: Wait for your Furby to go crazy before taking your finger out of its mouth. Your Furby will start making weird noises, and its eyes will turn white. It will shake and act "crazy." After a few moments, your Furby's eyes will turn into evil, slanted eyes.

steps.title: Enjoy your evil Furby!
steps.content: Enjoy your evil Furby! It will act very grumpy, and snap at you if you try to pet it. If you'd like to make your Furby nice again, try talking to it a lot, or playing a lot of music. Some people find that this may take up to 10 or 15 minutes. You can also try petting it a lot; eventually it will turn nice again.

steps.title: Set your Furby Boom down in front of you.
steps.content: Set your Furby Boom down in front of you. The Furby Boom's evil personality is called "Feisty." Many people claim that this Feisty personality is similar to the Furby 2012's Evil or Viking personality. [1] X Research source Unlike the evil Furby 2012, the evil/feisty Furby Boom is female.

steps.title: Turn the Furby upside down.
steps.content: Turn the Furby upside down. Your Furby may think this is funny at first and giggle or laugh. Don't worry, it will eventually turn evil.

steps.title: Turn the Furby right side up.
steps.content: Turn the Furby right side up. Again, your Furby may think that this is funny. However, after a while it will soon change its mind.

steps.title: Keep flipping the Furby upside down and right side up.
steps.content: Keep flipping the Furby upside down and right side up. [2] X Research source After about a minute or so of flipping, your Furby will decide that it's had enough and it will turn Feisty. It will have evil, slanted eyes with girly lashes. Your Furby may cry and act sick while you are flipping it. Don't take pity on it. Keep flipping it. The app version will have a nunchucks, and the words: BAM! Pow!

steps.title: Enjoy your evil Furby.
steps.content: Enjoy your evil Furby. If you'd like to turn your Furby nice again, try give it lots of hugs. You can also try petting it a lot. Some people find that pulling its tail often also changes its personality.
